item.description:
Scientists pose the question:

How did three "indestructible" steel-framed skyscrapers really collapse on 9/11/2001?

Using the government's own reports and research of physics professor Steven Jones, Kevin Ryan and Jim Hoffman, this film dismantles the official story that three World Trade Center buildings collapsed from fire and aircraft damage alone.

Come and see "Improbable Collapse: The Demolition of Our Republic" with filmmaker Michael Berger.

Discussion and Q&A to follow with Michael Berger, Director and Media Coordinator for http://911Truth.org... .

DVD's and other resources will be available.

http://boston911truth...

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Improbable Collapse: The Demolition of Our Republic
